verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: WORCESTER] — [ARG0: Massachusetts Republicans] [V: love] [ARG1: President Trump] , [ARGM-ADV: even if their governor and many fellow residents don’t . The party faithful , who gathered for the state GOP]

WORCESTER — Massachusetts Republicans love President Trump , even if their governor and many fellow residents don’t . [ARG1: The party faithful] , [R-ARG1: who] [V: gathered] [ARGM-PRP: for the state GOP]
